item.title: Kubernetes and Vault integration
item.description: In this post I will show you how you can integrate HashiCorp Vault to Kubernetes easily thanks to Banzaicloud’s Bank-Vaults.

item.title: Install hashicorp vault
item.description: Hashicorp vault is a highly scalable, highly available, environment agnostic way to generate, manage, and store secrets.
